title: Photograph of a cookie cutter and cookie dough
description: Lecture 4 discusses object-oriented programming in C++: a class is like a cookie cutter, and objects are like cookies. (Photograph courtesy of Guillaume Brialon on Flickr.)

image_metadata.caption: Lecture 4 discusses object-oriented programming in C++: a class is like a cookie cutter, and objects are like cookies. (Photograph courtesy of [Guillaume Brialon](http://www.flickr.com/photos/guillaumebrialon/3213750216/) on Flickr.)
